value: <l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">to the shelves of college libraries were the Greek &</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Roman classics. The learned read them; & the nobles.</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">show against these august ancients</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">There they sit, in the palace, embroidering, reading,</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">playing their musical instrument; &</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">the background of the mind is in Italy, in France, in</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Greece; <del>but in the foreground is England,</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>the background of the</del> <del>b</del> <del>eye is</del> eye is</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>when he looks back, into the physical eye,</del></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">thick with smoke, <del>no</del> with a log for a pillow:</l>
